text: Ta shuo:â€œWo de zongzu a! Nimen gaosu wo ba! Ruguo wo shi yiju cong wo de zhu jiang shi de mingzheng de, bingqie ta ceng jiang cong ziji fachu de ci'en shangcile wo, name, ruguo wo weikangle zhenzhu, shei neng baozheng wo bu shou ta de chengfa ne? Nimen zhi neng shi wo zaoshou geng da de sunshi
